title: Will UK pubs reopen after the Coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic? - Quora

response.answer_text: Half my family lives in the UK,my mom was born in Scotland with 4 brothers ,my uncle's, that all moved to Canada after fighting in WW2. I don't care if the Apocalypse is coming,them blokes will be in the Pubs with warm beer when it does come. Drinking Pubs with chips on the side is the cure all for everything. You can't keep a good people down for too long

Of course they will ! Just like any other business - they’re likely to have to make some changes, but they’re no different to any other retail business ! What were you thinking - that the whole pub culture of the UK has now closed permanently !
